tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Smiles India Family Dentistry for the first time. Dr. D. Arunachalam is amazing and  so is his staff. They were extremely cooperative and caring.                    
Dr. D. Arunachalam  explained and guided me through the procedures *** *** **** ************** I felt very comfortable and confident in getting my treatment done. They used modern equipment and the facility was very clean.
I got my problem resolved in a single sitting and I was fully satisfied.
 Would highly recommend Dr.D. Arunachalam  and Smiles India Family Dentistry. Thank you Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First of all, getting an appointment at short notice was easy. The staff took only a few minutes to check and give me options that suited my calendar as well.

Secondly, from the moment I entered, I was greeted by very friendly and courteous staff. The cleanliness and ambience of the rooms gave me a very positive vibe about the place. 

Thirdly, the quipment used to do an X-ray was very modern and gave me an impression of accurate process for diagnostics

Lastly, both Dr Aishwarya and Dr Arunachalam were very friendly doctors to interact with. 

Dr Arunachalam came up as a very kind and simple human being. He was very polite while talking to me and addressed all my questions and concerns patiently. I developed a lot of respect towards him within few minutes of interaction. He performed the surgery to the best of my satisfaction. 

I am going to visit the clinic again on Wednesday for a round of oral hygiene and cleaning services. I have become a fan of the clinic and will recommend this Center to others as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Before I share my experience. thank you so much doctor for giving the best dental experience. ** ** ** *** *** **** ******* ******* Went there with multiple dental issues. He and his team explained each of problem and showed the progress as well in their x-ray.  after multiple visits each issue was addressed with proper diagnosis. The results are great and it's been 6 months and there aren't any issues. *touchwood*. Have to mention there was no pain while monitoring anesthesia for dental cavities. it was jus a sec feeling and the rest you feel nothing.. Would definitely recommend him and worth each penny. ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
There should not be more than 15 minutes delay if time was assigned. Everyone was waiting while Dr was attending unscheduled patients.
I got hurt because Dr was in a hurry got cut inside near the teeth, inner cheek skin torn by blade.
Teeth cleaning costs rs3000 and I can send the pic  it isn't cleaned properly. I noticed this only after anesthesia effect subsidised at home when I could feel rough teeth by touch of tongue.
Just 1 teeth filling cost Rs2000. I had got root canal treatment done in Bangalore in 2k just 6 month back.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My wife had an unbearable dental pain when we visited my daughter's house at Chennai. I consulted Dr. D Arunachalam at Smiles India dental clinic located at Indhiranagar, Chennai first time, as his name was recommended by my Mumbai dentist Dr. Ajay kakar.  She is a case of post renal transplant under immuno suppressive medications. Dr. Arunachalam  carefully examined her dental problems and treated her for Root Canaling safely with gentle care. She was pain free with first sitting itself. Two sittings are over and one more is scheduled to complete the procedure. I recommend "Smiles India" for dental excellent.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr Arunachalam is a thorough professional and so are the other staff at the clinic. Thanks for making the dental experience pleasant and stress free !

I initially went there for a general cleaning / check up and was patiently given a thorough prognosis of dental stuff to be fixed and I went through the subsequent visits to get the fillings done and am currently getting a Root Canal done.

Full credit to the front office for the manner in which they handle the calls, book appointments which trigger emails / SMS through the Practo network. I like the SMS reminders on the day of the appointment.
The Billing / receipt generation is done seamlessly without my having to ask for a receipt. Pls keep up the good practice!

review: Awesome...I had my wisdom tooth extraction  ( three together )....with consious anesthesia....to my surprise I haven't had any pain after surgery but swelling was there for 5 days later subsided....sutures removed after 10 days...had antibiotics for 5 days...now I'm perfectly alright...I should thank Dr.Arunachalam for his patience in explaining the procedure so nicely and clearing all my doubts....the post surgical care was absolutely amazing they took such a care....Thank you doctor and the nurses for their patience and care...the core thing is cleanliness...sterilisation to the mark...totally an awesome experience.....

review:
There were 3 procedures done on 3 different sites on my teeth under conscious sedation. This involved a lot of examination (with state of the art equipment available and used with expertise in the clinic premises itself) and planning, not to forget medicines and reminderrs from the clinic to adhere to the schedule .
 Planning involved anaesthetist Dr Radika's  time , a very experienced doctor in this branch of medicine. 

This is written nearly a day after all these surgical procedures - extraction/ root canal/ implant preps and I am not in any discomfort at all, fell pretty good orally and physically.
Huge Thanks , Very friendly, supportive Drs and Staff ,
Keep smiling

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. D. Arunachalam is highly skilled and restored an almost gone tooth. He is very humane. He is very patient friendly and my most favourite doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I waited almost 45min for my appt. The X-ray tech forgot to ask me to remove my earrings, so needed to redo x-ray. 
Met with doctor, he was very friendly and pleasant. I was very pleased to meet him and was ready to go ahead with the work of crowns and grind guard. 

Then I had my cleaning.....
it was **** **** *** painful. She started by pinching my lip very hard, hours later it still hurts.  
I also had to ask her to go back and remove tartar. She tried to tell it was just impression material. I had to demonstrate that tartar. She finally removed the tarter. *** ****** ** ** *** ********* When I asked about it, she went for a colleague. The technician then agreed to do it, *** ** *** *** * ****** ***** ** ****  I had to do it myself. I asked to speak to doctor, but he was unavailable and made no attempt to contact me.
*** **** ******** created much doubt about moving forward with more work there. 
It's unfortunate, the doctor seemed good.

reply_text: Thank you very much for your feedback. While we make every effort to do the best we can for our patients, some time we do go overboard in our enthusiasm, forgetting that it could be embarrassing for our patients. I do apologize for the inconvenience and we will all do our best to keep our workplace a happy and friendly atmosphere. Thank you once again for your valuable feedback. Best regards.
